entries.journal_entry_description: You've agreed to learn the trade of personal protection, working as a bodyguard under Peawp R'dawc.
entries.task01_message_box_text: Center of Being is a skill which decreases damage taken. It allows you to take substantially less damage from enemy attacks compared to a player without this skill. The skill is granted in the first skill box for Unarmed and Polearm in the Brawler tree. For players going up One handed weapons, it will be granted in the second skill box and for Two handed weapons, in the third skill box.
entries.task03_journal_entry_description: Head to the Lucky Despot and meet up with your first client. A Bith businessman by the name Otwi Opawl.
entries.task04_journal_entry_description: Introduce yourself quickly to Otwi and then be alert for any threats to his safety that might appear.
entries.task06_journal_entry_description: You and your client is under attack. Defend Otwi at all costs!
entries.task07_journal_entry_description: You survived the ambush. Talk to Otwi and make sure that he's okay.
entries.task08_journal_entry_description: Return to Peawp in the Combat Guild Hall.
